statementText: // Auto-generated header code// Auto-generated header code ended// User scriptUSE DATABASE
SELECT DISTINCT SeriesName,           RatingName,           Rating    FROM dbo.Ratings
SELECT DISTINCT SeriesName,         Tweet,        RetweetCount,        Sentiment    FR
SELECT        SeriesName,        ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY RatingName ORDER BY Rating
SELECT        SeriesName,        COUNT(Tweet) AS TweetCount,        SUM(RetweetCount) AS
SELECT SeriesName,           ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY TweetCount) AS TweetScore,
SELECT s.SeriesName,           SUM(Score) == null? 0 : SUM(Score) AS RatingsScore,
SELECT SeriesName,           RatingsScore + TweetScore + RetweetScore AS OverallScore,
